posts.post_content:
I have 3 T206's for sale right now. My brother and I are upgrading our collections and are selling all our PSA 1-4's. Here are the 3 cards listed now:

Bill Lattimore PSA 3 Piedmont 350 $35
George Merritt PSA 3 Piedmont 350 $35
Mickey Doolan (fileding) PSA 2 Piedmont 350 $24

 if you would like a list of the other cards available now let me know.

I'll take a list, please.  Send to [url]bowen@bowenlaw.us[/url]

Thanks
Email sent on the 3 offered for sale
Payment sent today for the Bill Lattimore PSA 3 Piedmont 350, George Merritt PSA 3 Piedmont 350 and the Mickey Doolan (fileding) PSA 2 Piedmont 350. Thanks.
